ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bard equip (was Katanas)
ygData.msgSnippet: Switch weapons to the opposite hands.  9/22 in main is better than 9/24 in main hand, assuming the stick can go in the off hand. Mu ... From: Henrik Holm
ygData.messageBody:
Switch weapons to the opposite hands. 9/22 in main is better than 9/24 in
main hand, assuming the stick can go in the off hand.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
Sent: Monday, July 23, 2001 11:43 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] bard equip (was Katanas)


> for weaps i also got a sainy's claw recently in CoM. stats
> are 6/19 int3
> ac10 piercing. what do you think of it? i could use better
> damaging weapons

I had one of these, but gave it to a guildmate when I aquried Yekesas. I
just sold my yeksas this weekend (They started to get resisted alot) and got
a Smoldering brand (9/22) for my secondary and a Jurneymans stick (9/24
effect tish) for my primary. The looks suck on these, but stat wise I like
em.
Btw I sold my gloves, but as allways Im pretty satisfied with what i got in
returnI got:
- Tolans darkwood helmet
- Jurneymans walking stick
- Spider fur cloak

Sold my yaks and got a smoldering brand.
Still have 3.5k in the bank and I need to sell the helmet (AC18 ranger only
Sup camoflage)


Musiker
